text: Dangshi, ni de zhu cong a dan de zisun de beiji zhong quchu tamen de houyi, bing shi tamen zhaoren. Zhu shuo:“Nandao wo bushi nimen de zhu ma?” Tamen shuo:“Zenme bushi ne? Women yi zuozhengle.”(Wo suoyi yao shi tamen zhaoren), shi yin wei bu yuan nimen zai fuhuo ri shuo:“Women shengqian queshi hushile zhe jian shi.”
